record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 574

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 574, introduced earlier today by Senator Reid, is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading and I object to my own request.

record.chair: The objection is heard. The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
